ai-tha-ap188:1.1_0: “You’ve come to the city of Death,
ai-tha-ap188:1.2_0: I guided the people of the earth:
ai-tha-ap188:1.3_0: I am permanently offended for them
ai-tha-ap188:1.4_0: I have gone to the excellent Bodhi.
ai-tha-ap188:2.1_0: After putting it on a lamp,
ai-tha-ap188:2.2_0: you’ve been accused like a tortoise:
ai-tha-ap188:2.3_0: There are eighteen grounds for less than eighteen.
ai-tha-ap188:2.4_0: Would I have a bad destination?
ai-tha-ap188:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bodhi.
